name: louis-material-syntax-light

1.0.0.name: louis-material-syntax-light
1.0.0.description: A light syntax theme for Atom that uses Google's Material Design color palette. Forked from silvestreh/atom-material-syntax-light

readme:
![](http://i.imgur.com/f58FC9u.png)
---

A light variant of [Atom Material Syntax](https://github.com/silvestreh/atom-material-ui) for [Atom Material UI](https://github.com/silvestreh/atom-material-ui). Inspired by Mattia Astorino's [SublimeText theme](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme).

![](http://i.imgur.com/HkCKXxX.png)
